climbs.name: Turkey Lips
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Greg Epperson, Maryann Loehr, John (N.Z.)

content.description: This climb goes up the SW face of The Tortuga, and is one of the first climbs you will see when you are hiking in from Ryan Campground.  It is on the right side of the west face, and climbs a crack which ends, and then you climbs up face past a bolt or two.
content.protection: small to med plus a QD or two for the bolt or bolts.
content.location: SW face of The Tortuga  (right side).

content.description: A short handcrack leads to a ledge below a fingertips to finger crack.  From there biting locks that favor those with petite endowments allow for painful progress.  At the top of the finger crack either break right to an awkward handcrack or left over crumbly face to the top of the OW.  The direct finish is guarded by a large bush.
content.protection: Tips and tips plus.  Handsize for start and anchor.
content.location: Tortuga is located on SW face of The Tortuga formation.  This face is distingushed by a large face split by an OW with two bolts.  This route is located right of the OW.

climbs.name: Cling Tenatiously to My Buttocks
climbs.fa: Todd Gordon, Norm Miller, Cyndie Bransford

content.description: This is the ramp/chimney witht the two bolts on the East face of the Tortuga.
content.protection: small to large plus a couple of QDs for the two bolts.
